name: The Unintended Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Contains the original soundtrack for "The Unintended Consequences of Curiosity" as DLC. Composed by Johannes Aikio

*The DLC will provide these tracks in MP3 format.
Original Soundtrack Track List:
  • 01-Menu Theme
  • 02-Overworld
  • 03-House
  • 04-Torlok
  • 05-Mokok
  • 06-Mokok Death
  • 07-Twin Caves
  • 08-Caveroon
  • 09-Winter Is Here
  • 10-Mohora Desert
  • 11-Fiery Path
  • 12-The Misty Forest
  • 13-Trailer
  • 14-Winderling
  • 15-Mud Caves
  • 16-Mud City Work Song
  • 17-Castle Appears
  • 18-Floor By Floor
  • 19-Filled With Puzzles
  • 20-Return Of The Mud King
  • 21-Up There
  • 22-What Is Heaven
  • 23-Waiting For Winderling
  • 24-Windy City
  • 25-Another Over World Day


Note: The DLC data will be added into the game's installation folder. A folder titled "Soundtrack" containing the MP3 data will be added.

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Finnish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better
  • Graphics: None
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
